attributes.action: cease the government assault on general medical practitioners in the UK and work with the profession to improve the  morale of general practitioners, now and in the future.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK's GPs are the bedrock of the NHS, with minimal waits to be seen, low costs, high workloads, and a very low rate of referral to hospitals. Destroying UK general practice will destroy the most effective part of the NHS.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
